discipline.name: Blood Sorcery
discipline.overview: Unlike other Disciplines, Blood Sorcery is a power that does not develop organically, instead, it is developed by being taught or through research of old tomes. It also functions slightly differently in that not only does it give powers per level but it also opens access to Blood Sorcery Rituals equal or lesser to the user's current Blood Sorcery level. However, ghouls of sorcerers or Thin-Bloods with temporary Disciplines from Resonances do not receive access to these rituals. At creation, if the character has Blood Sorcery they receive one ritual for free, further rituals cost both experience and time. Rituals generally take at least the square of their rating in weeks to learn. The powers on a surface level may appear weaker, but where it shines is in the versatility of the rituals and flexibility as Sorcerers can learn as many rituals as they desire.

level1.name: Corrosive Vitae
level1.notes: Does not work against unliving flesh, such as other vampires

level1.name: Shape the Sanguine Sacrament
level1.effect: Shape blood into a shape or image
level1.notes: If the user uses their vitae, it costs one Rouse Check
level1.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Winter's Teeth #3 / Book of Nod Apocrypha, page 33

level1.name: A Taste for Blood
level1.effect: Discover traits of another through their blood

level1.name: Koldunic Sorcery
level1.effect: Attune with and sense through an element, e.g. Water
level1.cost: One Rouse Check and Aggravated Health Damage
level1.notes: Can be taken multiple times to attune to other elements
level1.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Blood Sigils, page 61

level2.name: Blood's Curse
level2.effect: Temporary increase another vampire's Bane Severity
level2.notes: If the target is a ghoul, thinblood, or Caitiff they get a clan bane

level2.name: Extinguish Vitae
level2.effect: In use, this increases another Kindred's Hunger
level2.notes: The victim can determine who used this power against them if they can see them and win an Intelligence + Occult vs Wits + Subterfuge roll

level2.name: Scour Secrets
level2.effect: Pore through a large amount of content within minutes
level2.duration: One night or till the information is found or there's a dead-end
level2.notes: This power does not allow the user to parse things written in a language they cannot understand
level2.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 98

level3.name: Blood of Potency
level3.notes: This power can allow a Kindred to bypass the Blood Potency limit set by their generation

level3.name: Scorpion's Touch
level3.effect: Change own vitae into paralyzing poison
level3.notes: A mortal who takes any damage from this will go unconscious

level3.name: Transitive Bond
level3.effect: Extend the properties of Blood Bonding in vitae
level3.notes: This power was developed originally by the Tremere to combat their bane to only resurface within the Sabbat
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Sabbat: The Black Hand, page 49

level3.name: Ripples of the Heart
level3.effect: Manipulate the blood or Blood of others
level3.notes: This power can inflict Compulsions on others who feed from the infected or alter the Resonance of a mortal
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Blood Stained Love, page 153

level4.name: Theft of Vitae
level4.effect: Manipulate blood from a victim through the air to feed
level4.notes: When in use the victim is under the same influence as a standard Kiss

level4.name: Blood Aegis
level4.duration: One scene or until damage is spent
level4.notes: For each Rouse Check, the user can reduce the damage taken by five points
level4.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 98

level5.name: Baal's Caress
level5.effect: Change the user's own Vitae into an aggressive and lethal poison
level5.notes: If a mortal takes one point of damage they die instantly

level5.name: Cauldron of Blood
level5.effect: Boil the victim's blood in their body
level5.notes: If a mortal takes one point of damage they die screaming

level5.name: Reclamation of Vitae
level5.effect: Reclaim the Blood given to create ghouls over distance
level5.notes: Those outside of the Sabbat take stains upon use
level5.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Sabbat: The Black Hand, page 50

amalgams.name: Ancestral Dominion
amalgams.effect: Urge a descendant to act even if against their own opinion
amalgams.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Cults of the Blood Gods, page 104

amalgams.name: Blood Form
amalgams.effect: Turn into an amorphous mass of blood

amalgams.name: Visceral Absorption
amalgams.effect: Draw in the remains of blood and body to the vampire to clean a scene
amalgams.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Sabbat: The Black Hand, page 49
